creditline: Gift of Dr. Robert J. Poor
markings: in ink, on sign top center: [Den Empfang / von 5000 MK/ für Zipperlin (?) in (illegible) bestätigt danken H. Kley]; translation: \'The receipt of 5000 Marks is (?); with thanks H. Kley\'; in ink, lower center: [München 27 Mai 23]
medium: Pen and brown ink on cream paper
provenance: Robert J. Poor, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1983.
signed: in pen and ink on sign: [H. Kley]
title: Nude Man Making a Sign
